Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 6 Saṃkiliṭṭhattika » 6.7 Pañhāvāra » 6.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 6.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Saṃkiliṭṭhattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
31.
2908Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke cattāri, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa.
<< 6.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Hetusabhāga >>
